mapper.update: CREATE TABLE h_users ( id BIGINT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY (START WITH 4) PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE, password VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, role_id NUMERIC(10), created_at NUMERIC(20), updated_at NUMERIC(20) )
CREATE TABLE h_roles ( id BIGINT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY (START WITH 4) PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, description VARCHAR(500), created_at NUMERIC(20), updated_at NUMERIC(20) )

CREATE TABLE h_menus ( id BIGINT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY (START WITH 5) PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, url VARCHAR(255), parent_id NUMERIC(10) DEFAULT 0, menu_level NUMERIC(2) DEFAULT 1, order_index NUMERIC(10) DEFAULT 0, icon_name varchar(255) DEFAULT 'LogIcon', created_at NUMERIC(20), updated_at NUMERIC(20) )
CREATE TABLE h_role_menus ( role_id INT NOT NULL, menu_id INT NOT NULL, primary key (role_id,menu_id) )
